name: Finding You (afuriin)
description:
"The dream that plays over and over."

Wander through the fragments of memories, trying to find what is invincible to the eye.

Finding You is a story-rich, casual point-and-click game. The game revolves around the player who can't seem to remember something they hold dear.  The game was made as a part of Mojiken Camp 2022, the internship program at Mojiken Studio, in a month's time. Feedback is appreciated and I hope you have fun playing the game!

Game Controls 

Mouse to investigate

Left Click to interact with objects

Right Click to choose answers/pick options

Note : Investigate and interact carefully. Check them more than once!
